00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'apache.php');
00041 
00042 class Cwlogs extends Apache
00043 {
00044     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00045     {
00046         global $Re_Ip;
00047 
00048         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00049             $re_user= '(\w+|)';
00050             $re_host= "($Re_Ip|)";
00051             $re_loglevel= '(LOG_EMERG|LOG_ALERT|LOG_CRIT|LOG_ERR|LOG_WARNING|LOG_NOTICE|LOG_INFO|LOG_DEBUG)';
00052             $re_file= '([\w\/\.]+\.php)';
00053             $re_func= '(\w+)';
00054             $re_line= '(\d+)';
00055             
00056             $re_logheader= "\s+$re_loglevel\s*($re_user@$re_host|)\s+$re_file:\s+$re_func\s+\($re_line\):";
00057             
00058             if (preg_match("/$re_logheader/", $logline, $match)) {
00059                 $cols['LogLevel']= $match[1];
00060                 $cols['User']= $match[3];
00061                 $cols['IP']= $match[4];
00062                 $cols['File']= $match[5];
00063                 $cols['Function']= $match[6];
00064                 $cols['Line']= $match[7];
00065                 
00066                 $re_nocolon= '([^:]+)';
00067                 $re_rest= '(.*)';
00068                 
00069                 $re= "/$re_logheader\s+$re_nocolon:\s+$re_rest$/";
00070                 if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00071                     $cols['Reason']= $match[8];
00072                     $cols['Log']= $match[9];
00073                 }
00074                 else {
00075                     $re= "/$re_logheader\s+$re_rest$/";
00076                     if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00077                         $cols['Reason']= $match[8];
00078                         // Reset Log column set to $logline by ParseSyslogLine()
00079                         $cols['Log']= '';
00080                     }
00081                 }
00082             }
00083             return TRUE;
00084         }
00085         return FALSE;
00086     }
00087 }
00088 ?>
